data.englishTranslation: I leave your religion in the care of Allah, as well as your safety, and the last of your deeds.
data.arabicVerse: أَسْتَوْدِعُ اللَّهَ دِينَكَ، وَأَمَانَتَكَ، وَخَوَاتِيمَ عَمَلِكَ

data.englishTranslation: May Allah give you piety as your provision, forgive your sins, and make goodness easy for you wherever you are.
data.transliteration: Zawwadakal-laahut-taqwaa, wa ghafara thanbaka, wa yassara lakal-khayra haythu maa kunta.
data.arabicVerse: زَوَّدَكَ اللَّهُ التَّقْوَى، وَغَفَرَذَنْبَكَ، وَيَسَّرَ لَكَ الْخَيْرَ حَيْثُمَا كُنْتَ
